Content:: Murugesu Chandrakumar is a Sri Lankan Politician .He was a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and the Deputy Chairman of Committees. He belongs to the Eelam People's Democratic Party. However, he contested under the symbol of United People's Freedom Alliance[1][2][3] He quit the Eelam People's Democratic Party and contested independently in 2020 Sri Lankan parliamentary elections.[4]
Title: Murugesu Chandrakumar - Wikipedia
